basics.name: Casandra Feen
basics.label: Program Manager
basics.summary: Dedicated professional with a diverse background in admissions, healthcare management, and residential support. I bring a blend of skills in data analysis, project management, and engaging interpersonal communication.

work.name: University of Massachusetts
highlights: Managing a team of PhDs for Institute of diversity sciences
Increased admissions in STEM undergraduate courses in UMass

work.name: College of Our Lady of the Elms
highlights: Achieved 71% increase in MBA admissions enrollment
Streamlined end-end admission processes for efficiency
Led Impactfulmarketing strategies, expanding program outreach

work.name: Interim Healthcare
work.position: Home Care Manager and Personal Care Aid
highlights: Manage daily operations of the home care department, ensuring compliance with healthcare regulations.
Provide compassionate and high-quality care to clients, maintaining meticulous clinical documentation.
Demonstrate exemplary organizational and administrative skills in overseeing clients, providers, and staff.

work.name: Servicenet
highlights: Support disabled adults, fostering independence and community integration.
Develop individualized programs to enhance life skills and social interactions.
Collaborate with residents, healthcare providers, and their families to address unique needs and goals.

education.institution: College of Our Lady of the Elms
